en.start:
*Introduction

*This is a simple moderation bot that complements _Group Butler/GroupThor_. Anyone else can use this bot in their groups to perform simple tasks like:
1Ô∏è‚É£Ô∏è Kick and Ban
*and most importantly*,
2Ô∏è‚É£Ô∏è Prevent the most notorious of spammers, who have been globally banned, from entering his/her group!

To get started, add this bot to your group(s) as an administrator.

For more information, use the /help command.

*Help Menu*

üí° Pro Tip: Use Inline Mode!

Simply Type `@thorshammerbot` And Add A Space In Any Chat!
en.banhammerinfo:
*Banhammer Commands*

You can use either `/, !, or #` as command prefixes

‚Ä¢ `/hammer [by reply|username|id]`: globally ban a user from all groups.
‚Ä¢ `/unhammer [by reply|username|id]`: globally unban a user from all groups.
en.superuserinfo:
*Superuser Commands*

You can use either `/, !, or #` as command prefixes

‚Ä¢ `/promote [by reply|username|id]`: promotes a user to a global admin.
‚Ä¢ `/demote [by reply|username|id]`: demotes a user from a global admin.
en.globaladmininfo:
*Global Admins Commands*

You can use either `/, !, or #` as command prefixes

Global admins can fully utilize the banhammer, a global admin can only be promoted by the superuser.

‚Ä¢ `/banlist`: sends the latest banlist to the log channel.
en.ingroupinfo:
*In-group Commands*

You can use either `/, !, or #` as command prefixes

‚Ä¢ `/kick [by reply]`: kick a user from the group.
‚Ä¢ `/ban [by reply]`: ban a user from the group.
‚Ä¢ `/admins`: lists the administrators of the group.
‚Ä¢ `/globaladmins`: lists global admins who have the power to use the banhammer.
